sentences.cn: 讲究卫生有助于增进健康.

sentences.en: He's got this fixation with cleanliness.
Her passion for cleanliness borders on paranoia.
I can't overemphasize the cleanliness of this place.
sentences.cn: 这个地方的清洁我再怎么说都不为过。

sentences.en: Maintain a high standard of cleanliness and correct working practice.
sentences.cn: 确保工作环境的高度清洁,确保工作方式的正确得体.

sentences.en: Many of Britain's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 英国许多海滩连最起码的卫生标准都达不倒。

sentences.en: Monitor and maintain cleanliness, sanitation and organisation of assigned and service areas.
sentences.cn: 关注并保持所分配区域的卫生和物品组织情况.

sentences.en: Not to neglect decency, or cleanliness, for fear of falling into Nastiness.
sentences.cn: 不可忽略体面 、 清洁, 否则会赃的不堪.

sentences.en: She has a fetish about cleanliness.
Some people are obsessive about cleanliness.
The public is growing to respect cleanliness and efficiency more and more.
sentences.cn: 公众越来越注重整洁和效率了.

sentences.en: We often get complimentary remarks regarding the cleanliness of our patio.
sentences.cn: 我们经常听人称赞我们的露台非常干净。

sentences.en: We require the cleanliness from our child.
Well, I'm very impressed by the cleanliness of the city.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 干净的都市,令人印象深刻.

words.tran_cn: [化工] 清洁剂；清洁工；干洗店；干洗商；洗洁器
清洁剂；清洁工；擦亮粉；使清洁的东西

trans.tran_en: the practice of keeping yourself or the things around you clean
